translations: 轮状病毒（一种致婴儿或新生畜胃肠炎的病毒）

sentences.sentence: There are many different strains of rotavirus.
sentences.translation: 轮状病毒分许多不同的病毒株。

sentences.sentence: But rotavirus can cause very unpleasant vomiting and diarrhoea.
sentences.translation: 但轮状病毒能引起严重呕吐和腹泻。

sentences.sentence: JEFFREY ROWLAND: "Almost all children in the world get rotavirus."
sentences.translation: 罗兰德：“全球几乎所有儿童都会感染轮状病毒。”
